response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those looking for high-quality solutions. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $120 for you. This offer includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide on how to maximize its use and a limited-time access to exclusive customer support. I hope you find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 120}
